item.title: Docker command
item.description: docker cp Notes: This is the note about how to use command line to restore .bak file in your local computer to docker. Example of docker cp First, the example of the command to copying file should look like the following, #example docker cp /Users/nicoleyu/Desktop/mysql/SampleDatabase.bak SqlServer_first:/var/backups General Form And when you search for docker cp, you will find the bellow command from the official document. docker cp [OPTIONS] CONTAINER:SRC_PATH DEST_PATH|- docker cp [OPTIONS] SRC_PATH|- CONTAINER:DEST_PATH # where cp means copying file between container and local filesystem Explain SRC_PATH: This is the path of your .
